value.title: DAX Fridays!# 28: RELATED and RELATEDTABLE -Part 2
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will go through two functions in DAX, related and relatedtable.  We will explain how they both work and when to use one or the other. value.title: DAX Fridays! #33: Quick Measures
value.excerpt: In today's video I will review the new functionality released by Microsoft in the April 2017 Power BI update called Quick Measures.  Quick Measures is a new featured that has been released as a preview feature, so if you want to start using it, you need to activate it under Options and preview features.

value.title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
